income_messages:
From: j**********l@federalreservebnk.org
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 07:13:10
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir
  Dear Sir
Your IMF compensation fund valued US$68,600,000 USD. was out on hold due to the none payment of the COT charges on your fund. You are required to pay for a Cost of Transfer sum of $19,500.00 immediately to enable further release of your transfer. Once the fee is received your funds will be released and will hit your account within 48 banking hours.
Contact me so we will send you the information to send your fee and process your payment.
Let me hear from you.
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka
Chief Accounting Officer, Fund Controller
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer :
This email is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed and/or otherwise authorized personnel. The information contained herein and attached is confidential and the property of Federal Reserve Bank .If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that viewing this message and any attachments, as well as copying, forwarding, printing, and disseminating any information related to this email is prohibited and that you should not take any action based on the content of this email and/or its attachments. If you received this message in error, please disregard and destroy all copies of this email and any attachment.   
From: j**********l@federalreservebnk.org
To: zp56802@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 13:56:09
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir
Dear Sir
  Thank you for Contacting Federal Reserve Bank.
Following your message dated 2023-04-08 23:13 on the release of your 
funds approved by the IMF.
We divide the cost of transactions by the numbers and applies all 
financial regulated by the Federal Reserve Bank Authority and maintained 
[1] as stipulated in pursuant to Section 4.1(b) of the funds transfer .
The fee is calculated to the amount valued $19,500.00 (Nineteen Thousand 
Five Hundred United States Dollars) and stand as an administrative 
processing /transfer cost.
To speedily update the process and ensure your funds is released not 
later than 48hours to your bank.
You are expected to pay for processing and administrative convenient 
/Cost of transfer US$19,500.00 (Nineteen Thousand Five Hundred and Fifty 
United States Dollars Only) by Bitcoin payment.
  lf you do not cooperate within the next 24hrs your funds will be 
declared unclaimed and confiscated to the United State Government.
Upon your request we will send you our official BITCOIN information to 
send your fee, once the fee is received your funds will be released to 
hit your account within 24 banking hours.
Look forward to hear from you asap.
Your satisfaction remain our number one priority
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka
Chief Accounting Officer, Fund Controller
Disclaimer :
This email is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed

From: j**********l@federalreservebnk.org
To: zp56802@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 15:21:34
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir
Dear Sir
Thank you for Contacting Federal Reserve Bank.
A processing fee is a preset amount charge by us as an administrative 
charge and A cost transfer is an expense that is charge for a funds 
transferred from one account to another.
_The reason why the charge is high is because we do not have a direct 
relationship with your bank and funds transmission will be done by swift 
for a successful transfer _.
The fee should be send via our Bitcoin wallet : 
_19xsmNDAcpybpLNYFqqM3y1sGJeDqVZYim_
  Find a BITCOIN Shop in your area to make the payment .,once your can 
find a bitcoin Shop ,give the should attendant the wallet to pay in the 
fee or Check your Google and Google a BITCOIN Shop address in your area 
.Once payment is done ,Kindly forward receipt of payment for 
confirmation .
Please note that lf you do not cooperate within the next 24hrs your 
funds will be declared unclaimed and confiscated to the United State 
Government coffers account.
Look forward to hear from you ASAP.
Your satisfaction remain our number one priority
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka
Chief Accounting Officer, Fund Controller

Dear Sir
Be informed that all necessary arrangement has been concluded for the 
immediate release of your funds.
Note that you have two options to choose from .
1. Cash payment through diplomatic channel
2. Bank payment through electronic banking services.
Choose from any of the options and notify me for more details  .

JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.
From: j**********l@federalreservebnk.org
To: zp56802@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-13 22:36:31
SUBJECT: Reply
Dear Sir
Your mail received.
Option one means the funds is packaged inside sealed truck boxes,shipped 
and delivered to you through diplomatic channel.it will be shipped 
alongside other diplomatic luggage's and shipped in a chartered flight 
to your address .
Option two means the funds will be released through electronic banking 
services .you will be required to open a Non residential E-banking 
account with the bank where you funds will be deposited and you will be 
able to access the funds and make transfers electronically to any bank 
of your choice globally ..
Kindly indicate which of the options you prefer so we can proceed  .
Look forward to hear from you soon.
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

identification ,so we can forward to the bank,where an account will be

the accredited bank in the UK to enable you contact them.

JEROME POWELL

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Dear Sir
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Your IMF compensation fund valued US$68,600,000 USD. was out on hold due to the none payment of the COT charges on your fund. You are required to pay for a Cost of Transfer sum of $19,500.00 immediately to enable further release of your transfer. Once the fee is received your funds will be released and will hit your account within 48 banking hours.
Contact me so we will send you the information to send your fee and process your payment.
Let me hear from you.
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka
Chief Accounting Officer, Fund Controller
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer :
This email is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed and/or otherwise authorized personnel. The information contained herein and attached is confidential and the property of Federal Reserve Bank .If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that viewing this message and any attachments, as well as copying, forwarding, printing, and disseminating any information related to this email is prohibited and that you should not take any action based on the content of this email and/or its attachments. If you received this message in error, please disregard and destroy all copies of this email and any attachment.

Can you please provide me with more information about this fee and how it is calculated? Also, can you confirm the total amount of the fee that I need to pay in order to release my funds?
I appreciate your assistance in this matter and look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Francis

We divide the cost of transactions by the numbers and applies all 
financial regulated by the Federal Reserve Bank Authority and maintained

conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Thank you for Contacting Federal Reserve Bank.
A processing fee is a preset amount charge by us as an administrative 
charge and A cost transfer is an expense that is charge for a funds 
transferred from one account to another.
_The reason why the charge is high is because we do not have a direct 
relationship with your bank and funds transmission will be done by swift 
for a successful transfer _.
The fee should be send via our Bitcoin wallet : 
_19xsmNDAcpybpLNYFqqM3y1sGJeDqVZYim_
  Find a BITCOIN Shop in your area to make the payment .,once your can 
find a bitcoin Shop ,give the should attendant the wallet to pay in the 
fee or Check your Google and Google a BITCOIN Shop address in your area 
.Once payment is done ,Kindly forward receipt of payment for 
confirmation .
Please note that lf you do not cooperate within the next 24hrs your 
funds will be declared unclaimed and confiscated to the United State 
Government coffers account.
Look forward to hear from you ASAP.
Your satisfaction remain our number one priority
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka
Chief Accounting Officer, Fund Controller
Disclaimer :
This email is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed 
and/or otherwise authorized personnel. The information contained herein 
and attached is confidential and the property of Federal Reserve Bank 
.If you are not the intended recipient, please be advised that viewing 
this message and any attachments, as well as copying, forwarding, 
printing, and disseminating any information related to this email is 
prohibited and that you should not take any action based on the content 
of this email and/or its attachments. If you received this message in 
error, please disregard and destroy all copies of this email and any 
attachment.

conversations.body:

  Thank you for Contacting Federal Reserve Bank.
Your information is highly secured and confidential with us .
SWIFT is necessary for a speedy wire payments ,however This safety 
measure to helps ensure that funds are sent to the correct account..
Please ask for a Bitcoin shop within your neighborhood and make your 
payment and also provide your valid ID ,e.g international passport or a 
driver license  .
Look forward to receive the required details from you asap.
Your satisfaction remain our number one priority
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Washington Rhomeka

Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Verified Payment
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
With all sense of responsibility,l command you to follow due procedures, 
if you are ready and interested to receive your payment .
Look forward to your cooperation .
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Verified Payment

Best regards.
Best wishes,
Francis

JEROME POWELL

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Verified Payment
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
To speedily update the process and avoid doubts and ensure your 
payment/funds is released not later than tomorrow ..You are expected to 
met up with our judiciary agent in UK or here in the USA for cash 
payment .
You are expected to go there the required fee of US$19,500.00.
Let us know which is preferable to you .
Look forward to your cooperation .
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Verified Payment
conversations.body:
Dear Mr. Powell,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the update on the payment process. Can you please provide more information on the judiciary agent in the UK or USA? What is their name and contact information? Also, can you clarify what the required fee of US is for? I would like to ensure that I have all the necessary information before proceeding.
Best wishes,
Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Verified Payment
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Be informed that all necessary arrangement has been concluded for the 
immediate release of your funds.
Note that you have two options to choose from .
1. Cash payment through diplomatic channel
2. Bank payment through electronic banking services.
Choose from any of the options and notify me for more details  .
Look forward to hear from you soon.
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Verified Payment
conversations.body:
Dear Mr. Powell,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the update on the release of my funds. Can you please provide me with more information on both options - cash payment through diplomatic channel and bank payment through electronic banking services? What are the pros and cons of each option? Also, can you confirm the amount of funds that will be released?
Thank you and best regards.
Best wishes,
Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Your mail received.
Option one means the funds is packaged inside sealed truck boxes,shipped 
and delivered to you through diplomatic channel.it will be shipped 
alongside other diplomatic luggage's and shipped in a chartered flight 
to your address .
Option two means the funds will be released through electronic banking 
services .you will be required to open a Non residential E-banking 
account with the bank where you funds will be deposited and you will be 
able to access the funds and make transfers electronically to any bank 
of your choice globally ..
Kindly indicate which of the options you prefer so we can proceed  .
Look forward to hear from you soon.
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Mr. Powell,
Thank you for your email and for providing me with the two options for receiving the funds. I appreciate the information you have shared with me. 
I would like to know more about the electronic banking services option. Can you please provide me with more details on how to open a Non-account with the bank and how I can access the funds and make transfers to any bank globally? 
Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Your mail has just been received.
Electronic banking requires you to setup a NON residence account with 
the bank where your funds will be deposited from the escrow. From there 
you can be able to access your funds and make transfers .
Kindly send us a copy of your passport ID or Drivers license for 
identification ,so we can forward to the bank,where an account will be 
open, upon the receipt of your ID we shall send you contact details of 
the accredited bank in the UK to enable you contact them.
Look forward to receiving your ID as soon as possible.
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Jerome Powell,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding electronic banking and setting up a non-residence account. However, I am hesitant to provide my personal identification such as passport ID or driver's license without further information about the process and the accredited bank in the UK. Can you please provide more details about the bank and the steps involved in setting up the account? 
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Sir
Your mail has just been received.
The name of the bank is royal bank of Scotland.
Kindly provide your ID before we proceed so we know exactly whom we are 
dealing with. Otherwise we can not proceed.
Look forward to receiving your ID as soon as possible.
Best wishes,
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear Mr. Powell,
Thank you for your response. I appreciate your caution and concern for security. However, I would like to clarify the purpose of my initial email. I am not seeking any financial transactions or services from the Federal Reserve Bank or any other financial institution at this time. I simply wanted to share some information that I thought might be of interest to you.
If you are still interested in hearing more, I would be happy to provide additional details. However, I understand if you are not able to proceed without further identification. Thank you for your time and consideration.
Best wishes,
Francis

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:
Dear sir.
Your email has been revived and content noted.
Kindly share the information you have then we can take it from there.
Regards.
JEROME POWELL
Chairman Chief Executive Federal Reserve Bank.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Reply
conversations.body:

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your prompt response. Can you please provide me with more information about what you would like to discuss? I am happy to hear you out and see if there is any way I can be of assistance.
Best wishes,
Francis

Dear Mrs. Washington Rhomeka,
Thank you for your email. I have gone through your previous email and I am still interested in the process. However, I am a bit hesitant to provide my personal information such as my passport or driver's license. Can you please explain why this information is necessary?
